Specifies the clipping, in pixels, relative to the top-left corner of the image, determined through the View.Location and View.Size properties.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ServerVisualization.View.GetImage(TXTextControl.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a clipping of an image as a string in Scalable Vector Graphics (.SVG) format. The clipping can be specified either through a rectangle or through a range of lines. All characters are contained with outline curve data that are cubic Bézier splines. Curve and line data coordinates are in twentieth of a point (twips). Images of all pixel-formats are embedded in Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format.
member.param: Specifies the clipping, in pixels, relative to the top-left corner of the image, determined through the View.Location and View.Size properties.
Specifies the first of a range of lines, one-based, determining the returned image.
Specifies the last of a range of lines, one-based, determining the returned image.
Specifies a maximum resolution value, in dots per inch, for images in pixel-formats.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ServerVisualization.View.GetUpdateRectangle(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the smallest rectangle that completely encloses the update region. When the document's visible part changes, a Changed event occurs and the changed part is added to the view's update region. The bValidate parameter can be used to reset the current update region to an empty rectangle. When the document's visible part changes because the document has been scrolled, the Changed event informs about the changed part, but it is not added to the update region.
member.param: Validates the current update region and resets it to an empty rectangle.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.WPF.ResourceProvider
member.summary: The ResourceProvider class provides static methods to receive bitmaps or strings from sources that can be accessed via an assigned identifier.

member.summary: Each FileMenuItem represents the identifier for a file menu item.

member.summary: The WPF.RibbonInsertTab class represents a ribbon tab for inserting pages, images, hyperlinks, bookmarks, headers and footers, textframes and symbols.

member.summary: Gets or sets the border style of the ruler bar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the colors of the ruler bar.

member.summary: Enables or disables the setting of page margins.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the ruler bar shows cell references when the current input position is in a table cell.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the ruler bar's scale.

member.summary: The WPF.RulerBarColors class gets, sets or resets the display colors of a WPF.RulerBar control.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.RulerBarColors.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WPF.RulerBarColors class. After creating the object with this constuctor, individual colors can be set. If the Colors object is assigned to the WPF.RulerBar.DisplayColors property, non-set colors are reset to their system dependent default values.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color at the left or top edge of the ruler bar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color used for the numbers of the ruler.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color at the right or bottom edge of the ruler bar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the ruler.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of dark separators.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of light separators.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.WPF.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle

member.name: F:TXTextControl.WPF.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.Standard
member.summary: The dialog's border and title bar equal to the style of a System.Windows.Window where the WindowStyle is set to System.Windows.WindowStyle.SingleBorderWindow and the ResizeMode to System.Windows.ResizeMode.NoResize.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.WPF.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.StandardSizable
member.summary: The dialog's border and title bar equal to the style of a System.Windows.Window where the WindowStyle is set to System.Windows.WindowStyle.SingleBorderWindow and the ResizeMode to System.Windows.ResizeMode.CanResize.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.WPF.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.Sidebar
member.summary: The dialog only displays the sidebar. The dialog is not sizable and neither a specific dialog border nor a title bar are set (equivalent to System.Windows.WindowStyle.None and System.Windows.ResizeMode.NoResize).

member.name: F:TXTextControl.WPF.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.SidebarSizable
member.summary: The dialog only displays the sidebar. The dialog is sizable (equivalent to System.Windows.ResizeMode.CanResizeWithGrip), but neither a specific dialog border nor a title bar are set (System.Windows.WindowStyle.None).

If the Colors object is assigned to the WPF.StatusBar.DisplayColors property, non-set colors are reset to their system dependent default values.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.BeginUndoAction(System.String)
member.summary: Begins a user-defined undo operation. All editing and fomatting changes made between BeginUndoAction and EndUndoAction belong to the undo operation. These changes are undone or redone in a single step. The specified user-defined name is available with the UndoActionName property.
member.param: Specifies the undo action's name.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Clear
member.summary: Clears the selected text or the character right from the current input position from the Text Control.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ClearUndo
member.summary: Clears the undo buffer of the Text Control.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ConditionalInstructionDialog
member.summary: Opens a dialog box to create a new Conditional Instruction.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ConditionalInstructionDialog(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a dialog box to edit a specific Conditional Instruction. If the document does not contain a Conditional Instruction with the specified name, the dialog is opened to create such a Conditional Instruction.
member.param: Specifies the name of the Conditional Instruction to edit or create.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Copy
member.summary: Copies the current selection in the Text Control to the Clipboard.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Cut
member.summary: Moves the current selection in the Text Control to the Clipboard.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.EndUndoAction
member.summary: Ends a user-defined undo operation. All editing and fomatting changes made between BeginUndoAction and EndUndoAction belong to the undo operation. These changes are undone or redone in a single step.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Find
member.summary: Opens the built-in Find dialog box to search for a text string in the text part with the input focus. This can be the main text, a text frame or a header or footer.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for the specified text string in the text part with the input focus. This can be the main text, a text frame or a header or footer. The search starts at the beginning of the text.
member.param: Specifies the text to search for.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Find(System.String,System.Int32,TXTextControl.FindOptions)
member.summary: Searches for the specified text string in the text part with the input focus. This can be the main text, a text frame or a header or footer. The search is done with the specified find options and starts at the specified position.
member.param: Specifies the text to search for.
Specifies the text position where the search starts, beginning with 0.
Specifies search options.

member.summary: Opens the dialog box showing the last opened tab.

member.summary: Opens the dialog box showing the specified tab.
member.param: Specifies the index of the tab, zero-based, that is displayed when the tabbed dialog box is opened.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ForeColorDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for setting the text color.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.FormattingStylesDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for creating, deleting and modifying formatting styles.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.FrameFillColorDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for choosing a color for the background of a paragraph or a table cell.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.FrameLineColorDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for choosing a color for the frame of a paragraph or a table.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetClipboardFormats
member.summary: Returns an array of ClipboardFormat values. These values specify all the data formats which are currently available in the clipboard and which can be pasted into a document. If there is no data format available, this method returns null.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetSupportedFonts
member.summary: Gets an array of strings specifying the names of all currently supported fonts. These fonts depend on the formatting device set with the WPF.TextControl.FormattingPrinter property. The method returns null if the WPF.TextControl has not been completely initialized.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetSupportedPaperSizes
member.summary: Gets an array of PaperSize structures specifying the names and the size of all currently supported paper sizes. These paper sizes depend on the formatting device set with the WPF.TextControl.FormattingPrinter property.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetTextFields(TXTextControl.TextFieldType)
member.summary: Returns a collection containing text fields of the specified types.
member.param: Specifies types of text fields.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetXmlElements(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of XML elements. It is an object of the type XmlElementCollection.
member.param: Specifies the XML element's name.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.GetVersionInfo
member.summary: Returns an object of the type VersionInfo, which provides information about the installed TX Text Control version.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ImageAttributesDialog
member.summary: Opens the dialog box showing the last opened tab.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ImageAttributesDialog(System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens the dialog box showing the specified tab.
member.param: Specifies the index of the tab, zero-based, that is displayed when the tabbed dialog box is opened.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.LanguageDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for setting the language of the selected text.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.ListFormatDialog
member.summary: Invokes the built-in dialog box for setting formatting attributes of bulleted and numbered lists.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Load
member.summary: Opens a file Open... dialogbox to select a file and loads the text from that file.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Load(TXTextControl.StreamType)
member.summary: Opens a file Open... dialogbox to select a file in the specified format and loads the text from that file. The dialogbox offers the specified file format filters.
member.param: Specifies one of the StreamType values.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Load(TXTextControl.StreamType,TXTextControl.LoadSettings)
member.summary: Opens a file Open... dialogbox to select a file and loads the text from that file using the specified special settings. The dialogbox offers the specified file format filters.
member.param: Specifies one of the StreamType values.
Specifies a LoadSettings object with additional information and settings for the load operation.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Load(System.String,TXTextControl.StreamType)
member.summary: Loads text formatted with the specified format. The new text is read from the specified file.
member.param: Specifies a file from which the data is loaded.
Specifies one of the StreamType values.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.TextControl.Load(System.IO.FileStream,TXTextControl.StreamType)
member.summary: Loads text formatted with the specified format. The new text is read from the specified file stream.

Specifies one of the StreamType values.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.WPF.ThesaurusDialog
member.summary: The ThesaurusDialog class implements a Windows Forms dialog box that shows synonyms for selected text or a word at the current input position which will be selected on opening the dialog.Each item of the dialog box has a name, available through its Name property, which corresponds with a member of the WPF.ThesaurusDialog.DialogItem enumeration.To use this dialog the TextControl must be connected with an object of type TXSpellChecker (version 7.0 or higher).

member.name: M:TXTextControl.WPF.Drawing.TXDrawingControl.SizeToContent
member.summary: If any changes of the the displayed shapes' visible bounds require an adaption of the TX Drawing Control bounds, the size and/or location of the control is expanded respectively decreased by the considering value of the considering shape's side(s). The method returns an array of doubles which represent the effected alteration for each control's side (left, top, right, bottom) in twips.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Web.TextControl.LoadDataFromJson(System.String)
member.summary: Uses data given as a JSON string as a data source. The JSON string has to contain an array of equally structured objects. Analyzes and uses the given objects as merge data in the same way as the method LoadDataFromModel.
member.param: The JSON string containing the merge data.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Web.TextControl.LoadDataFromJsonAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Uses data given as a JSON string as a data source. The JSON string has to contain an array of equally structured objects. Analyzes and uses the given objects as merge data in the same way as the method LoadDataFromModel. The method returns immediately.
member.param: The JSON string containing the merge data.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Web.TextControl.LoadDataFromModel(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Interprets all public properties of the objects in the collection as possible table columns and / or child tables. The type of the first object in the collection is analyzed via .NET reflection and used as the basis of the assumed table structure. For more information about using object based data sources see DocumentServer.MailMerge.MergeObjects. The method returns immediately.
member.param: Specifies a System.Collections.IEnumerable that contains the merge data.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Web.TextControl.LoadDataFromModel(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Allows to additionally specify a format which should be applied when converting date / time values and numerical values to strings.

The format which should be applied when converting date / time values and numerical values to strings.

member.summary: The content represents a go to interface.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle
member.summary: Specifies the requested border and title bar layout of the sidebar dialog.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.Standard
member.summary: The dialog's border and title bar equal to the style of a System.Windows.Forms.Form where the FormBorderStyle is set to System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.StandardSizable
member.summary: The dialog's border and title bar equal to the style of a System.Windows.Forms.Form where the FormBorderStyle is set to System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.Sidebar
member.summary: The dialog only displays the sidebar. The dialog is not sizable and neither a specific dialog border nor a title bar are set (equivalent to System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle).

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.SidebarDialogStyle.SidebarSizable
member.summary: The dialog only displays the sidebar. The dialog is sizable (equivalent to System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Sizable), but neither a specific dialog border nor a title bar are set.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.DialogLocation

member.summary: Gets or sets the requested border and title bar layout of the sidebar dialog.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.IsPinned
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Sidebar is rendered inside another control (property value is set to true) or displayed as dialog.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Sidebar.IsSizable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Sidebar can be sized with the mouse.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.IconTextRelation
member.summary: Specifies the position of the text and the kind of icon relative to each other on objects of type RibbonButton and RibbonTextBox:

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.IconTextRelation.LargeIconLabeled
member.summary: If the object is part of a RibbonGroup the item displayes its large icon above its text. If the item is an object of type RibbonButton and inserted as a drop-down item, the image is displayed horizontally before the text and the description text.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.IconTextRelation.SmallIconLabeled
member.summary: The item displayes its small icon horizontally before the text.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.IconTextRelation.SmallIconUnlabeled
member.summary: The item's small icon is displayed, but not its text.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.IconTextRelation.NoIconLabeled
member.summary: Only the item's text is displayed.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonListView.ListViewMode.Icon
member.summary: A RibbonListViewItem displayes its icon.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonListView.ListViewMode.Text
member.summary: A RibbonListViewItem displayes its text.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonListView.ListViewMode.DropDown
member.summary: A RibbonListViewItem a drop-down.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonSeperator.SeperatorAlignment
member.summary: Determines the alignment of the RibbonSeperator:

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonSeperator.SeperatorAlignment.Horizontal
member.summary: The separator is aligned horizontally.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonSeperator.SeperatorAlignment.Vertical

member.summary: Only digits are valid text box characters.

member.summary: Adds a control of type RibbonButton, RibbonComboBox, RibbonLabel, RibbonListView, RibbonTextBox or RibbonSeperator to the end of a specific row inside the horizontal ribbon group.

The row where to add the control.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.HorizontalRibbonGroup.AddRange(System.Windows.Forms.Control[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an array of controls to the end of a specific row. These controls must be objects of type RibbonButton, RibbonComboBox, RibbonLabel, RibbonListView, RibbonTextBox or RibbonSeperator.
member.param: An array of controls to be added to this group.
The row where to add the controls.

The row where to insert the control.

An array of controls to be inserted to this group.
The row where to insert the controls.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox
member.summary: The RibbonTextBox class is a control that can be used to display or edit unformatted text.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RibbonTextBox class.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.DisplayMode
member.summary: Sets the RibbonTextBox's superordinate display settings and gets its corresponding text icon relation rendering to the current group's width.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.IsScalable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the RibbonTextBox changes its display mode when the related ribbon group is scaled by resizing the application.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.KeyTip
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the RibbonTextBox.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is displayed before the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.LargeIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32x32 1/96 inch icon for this RibbonTextBox.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.ParentCollection
member.summary: Gets the RibbonItemCollection that contains this RibbonTextBox.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.SelectedText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the current selection in the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.SelectionLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.SelectionStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting position of the text selected in the text box

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.SmallIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16x16 1/96 inch icon for this RibbonTextBox.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.ShowUpDownButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a value whether the text box's up down buttons are shown or not.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.Text
member.summary: Overridden. Gets or sets the text that is inserted in the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.TextAlign
member.summary: Gets or sets how text is aligned in the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.TextBoxLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is displayed behind the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.TextBoxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width, in 1/96 inch, of the text box.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.Windows.Forms.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox.ToolTip
member.summary: Gets an object of type RibbonToolTip that displays text when the mouse pointer hovers over the item.
